summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Ravenna Avenue from East 60th Street to East 62nd Street on the west; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9498 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
